p: The most promising results were shown by the combined application resulting in 30% and 27.3% increase in soil moisture content at 10% and 20% contamination, 40% and 23% increase in nitrogen contents at 10% and 20% contamination, 10â€“3% in phosphorous content and from trace level to detectable amounts in potassium for 10% and 20% contaminated soil, respectively (Supplementary Table 1).
